Problem Identification: Detect fraudulent bank transactions and provide a web UI for exploration and real-time predictions.
Data Issues / EDA: Missing values in balances; extreme amounts; strong class imbalance with very few fraud cases; categorical 'type' feature; high-cardinality account identifiers excluded from modeling; schema validation and train/test split performed.
ML Model features: Preprocessing: SimpleImputer (median/most-frequent) and OneHotEncoder for 'type'; Model: HistGradientBoostingClassifier with balanced handling; Decision-threshold control for precision/recall trade-off; Endpoints: Flask REST /api/predict and /api/transactions; Frontend: HTML/CSS/JS with filter chips and CSV export.
Results: Evaluated using ROC-AUC, precision-recall and confusion matrix; threshold tuned for higher recall on fraud; UI displays probability and label; table shows live data with filters and pagination.
Business Impact: Reduces fraud losses via early detection; supports auditability with downloadable CSV; speeds analyst workflows through fast filtering and clear visuals; easy to deploy as lightweight Flask app.
